attributes.action: Deport Abu Qatada from the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned request that Her Majesty's Government of the United Kingdom listen to the British people and ignore the ruling of the European Court of Human Rights on the deportation of Abu Qatada from the United Kingdom to Jordan. We ask of the Secretary of State for Home Affairs; The Rt Hon. Theresa May MP to personally review this matter and take into consideration the security and general interest of the British people.
